title: Add rest timer, workout plans, and age-accessible interface improvements

requirements.summary: Add rest timer feature to workout logging with 1-2 minute countdown and notifications
acceptanceCriteria: Users can start a rest timer after completing a set
Timer displays countdown from 1 or 2 minutes (user selectable)
Visual and/or audio notification when rest period completes
Timer integrates seamlessly into the WorkoutLogger component

file_operations.description: Add the generated rest timer icon with stopwatch design in energetic orange theme to frontend assets
Create a custom hook that manages rest timer state with duration selection (60 or 120 seconds), countdown logic, completion notifications, and timer controls (start, pause, reset)

Create a rest timer component displaying countdown with circular progress indicator, duration selection buttons (1 min / 2 min), start/pause/reset controls, and completion alert with audio notification using the generated rest-timer-icon.dim_64x64.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/
Integrate RestTimer component below each set input group with a toggle to show/hide the timer, automatically starting after set completion if enabled, and maintaining workout logging functionality

requirements.summary: Create workout plan management system for creating, saving, and following structured workout plans
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create named workout plans with predefined exercises, sets, and reps
Users can view a list of their saved workout plans
Users can select a workout plan to follow during workout logging
Backend stores workout plans with stable types and CRUD operations

file_operations.description: Add the generated workout plan icon showing stacked documents or checklist to frontend assets

Add React Query hooks for fetching workout plans (useWorkoutPlans) and mutation for creating workout plans (useCreateWorkoutPlan) using the backend interface methods getWorkoutPlans and createWorkoutPlan
Create a component displaying saved workout plans in cards showing plan name, number of days, exercise count per day, with select button to load into workout logger and loading skeletons

Create a form component for creating workout plans with plan name input, number of days selector, day-by-day exercise builder with exercise selection from library, sets/reps configuration, and submit button using the generated workout-plan-icon.dim_64x64.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/
Create a page displaying WorkoutPlanList and WorkoutPlanForm components with tabs or accordion layout, header with workout plan icon and title 'My Workout Plans'
Add route definition for /plans path rendering the WorkoutPlans page component within the existing router configuration
Add navigation link to /plans route in the header navigation menu between log and history links with label 'Plans' and workout plan icon
Add workout plan selector dropdown above exercise inputs that loads selected plan's exercises and pre-fills the form with plan structure, with option to clear and log manually
Add a quick action card linking to /plans route with workout plan icon, title 'Workout Plans', and description 'Create and follow structured plans'

requirements.summary: Design age-accessible interface for users 10-60 years with improved readability and usability
acceptanceCriteria: Font sizes are large enough for readability (minimum 16px base)
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
Navigation is straightforward with clear labels and icons
Interactive elements have sufficient touch target sizes (minimum 44x44px)

file_operations.description: Update base font size to 16px minimum, increase button and interactive element padding for 44x44px touch targets, enhance text size scale for headings and body text
Adjust color contrast ratios in both light and dark themes to meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text), increase base font size, improve focus indicator visibility
Increase navigation link font sizes, add clearer icon labels, improve spacing for touch targets, simplify navigation structure with larger clickable areas
Increase input field sizes, button heights, and font sizes for better readability and touch interaction, add clearer labels and instructions
Increase search input size, filter button sizes, and exercise list item height for easier interaction, improve label clarity
Increase stat card text sizes, improve number readability with larger fonts, enhance label contrast and spacing
Increase hero section font sizes, action card text and button sizes, improve overall page spacing for better visual hierarchy

requirements.summary: Add home workout category with bodyweight exercises to the exercise library
acceptanceCriteria: Exercise library includes a 'Home Workout' muscle group category
Category contains at least 10 bodyweight exercises (push-ups, squats, planks, etc.)
Users can filter exercises to show only home workout options
Backend Exercise type supports categorization for home workouts

file_operations.description: Add the generated home workout icon with house and fitness symbols to frontend assets

Add 'Home Workout' to muscle group filter options with the generated home-workout-icon.dim_64x64.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/, add 10+ bodyweight exercises (Push-ups, Squats, Lunges, Planks, Burpees, Mountain Climbers, Jumping Jacks, Sit-ups, Leg Raises, Superman Hold) with category 'Bodyweight' and muscleGroup 'Home Workout' to the default exercise list
Add a quick action card or badge highlighting home workout category with home workout icon, linking to exercise library filtered by 'Home Workout'
